entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 24 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Saturday 04 March 2023
